name: root
description: React component for showing carousel just like a film strip

scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev && npm run bump:auditfix
scripts.bump:dev: if [ `cat package.json | jq -r '.devDependencies | length'` -ne 0 ]; then npm install $(cat package.json | jq -r '.pinDependencies as $p | ((.devDependencies // {}) | keys) | map(. + "@" + ($p[.] // ["latest"])[0]) | .[]'); fi
scripts.bump:prod: if [ `cat package.json | jq -r '.dependencies | length'` -ne 0 ]; then npm install --save-exact $(cat package.json | jq -r '.pinDependencies as $p | ((.dependencies // {}) | keys) | map(. + "@" + ($p[.] // ["latest"])[0]) | .[]'); fi
scripts.bump:packages: for i in `find packages -name package.json ! -path */node_modules/* | xargs realpath | xargs dirname`; do echo [32m--- Bumping $i/package.json ---[0m; cd $i; npm run bump; if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo [31m--- Error while bumping $i/package.json ---[0m; break; fi; cd $OLDPWD; done; echo [32m--- Bump completed ---[0m && lerna clean --yes && lerna bootstrap
scripts.precommit:bundle: cd packages && cd bundle && npm run precommit --
scripts.precommit:component: cd packages && cd component && npm run precommit --
scripts.precommit:isomorphic-react: cd packages && cd isomorphic-react && npm run precommit --
scripts.precommit:isomorphic-react-dom: cd packages && cd isomorphic-react-dom && npm run precommit --

skipBump.react: Single version of isomorphic-react across mono-repo.
skipBump.react-dom: Single version of isomorphic-reac across mono-repo.
